**Schema Update Note â€“ Spec v3 Migration**

Effective immediately, the schema for Spec v3 will adopt `snake_case` naming conventions for all field identifiers.
All new fields added to Spec v3 will follow `snake_case` naming.
Existing fields using `camelCase` will remain available for a transitional period but are officially deprecated and will be removed by **2025-10-01**.
